items.name: Pancakes
items.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.

items.name: Avocado Toast
items.description: Toasted sourdough with mashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a poached egg.

items.name: Omelette
items.description: Three-egg omelette with your choice of fillings: cheese, ham, mushrooms, spinach.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

items.name: Club Sandwich
items.description: Triple-layer sandwich with turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo. Served with fries.

items.name: Veggie Burger
items.description: Grilled vegetable patty with lettuce, tomato, onion, and aioli. Served with a side salad.

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: Espresso with steamed milk and a thick layer of foam.

items.name: Herbal Tea
items.description: Selection of herbal teas: chamomile, mint, lemon ginger.

items.name: Chocolate Cake
items.description: Rich chocolate cake with a molten center.

items.name: Cheesecake
items.description: Classic New York cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

items.name: Ice Cream Sundae
items.description: Vanilla ice cream topped with chocolate sauce, whipped cream, and a cherry.
